underrealmlich.rules_text:
If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards if your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

assassinstrophy.name: Assassin's Trophy
assassinstrophy.rules_text: Destroy target permanent an opponent controls. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.
assassinstrophy.flavor: A power vacuum for the Azorious. A keepsake for Vraska.

charneltroll.name: Charnel Troll
charneltroll.rules_text:
Trample

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Charnel Troll. Otherwise, scarifice it.

BG, Discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Charnel Troll.

hatcheryspider.name: Hatchery Spider
hatcheryspider.rules_text:
Reach


Undergrowth - When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. You may put a green permanent card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

mausoleumsecrets.name: Mausoleum Secrets
mausoleumsecrets.rules_text: Undergrowth - Search your library for a black card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

glowsporeshaman.name: Glowspore Shaman
glowsporeshaman.rules_text: When GLowspire Shaman enters the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library.
glowsporeshaman.flavor: From death she grows living grandeur.

golgariraiders.name: Golgari Raiders
golgariraiders.rules_text:
Haste

Undergrowth - Golgari Raiders enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.
golgariraiders.flavor: What the Golgari can't claim through patient undercity expansion, they seize in brazen topside sorties.

kraulharpooner.name: Kraul Harpooner
kraulharpooner.rules_text:
Reach

Undergrowth - When Kraul Harpooner enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature with flying you don't control. Kraul Harpooner gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have Kraul Harpooner fight that creature.

lotlethgiant.name: Lotleth Giant
lotlethgiant.rules_text: Undergrowth - When Lotleth Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target opponent for each creature card in your graveyard.
lotlethgiant.flavor:
"I prefer the big and looming to the small and skittering."
	
	- Cevraya, Golgari shaman

molderhulk.name: Molderhulk
molderhulk.rules_text:
Undergrowth - This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.

When Molderhulk enters the battlefield, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

necroticwound.name: Necrotic Wound
necroticwound.rules_text: Undergrowth - Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
necroticwound.flavor: The assassins of the Ochran distill toxins from the remains of their previous victims.

ochranassassin.name: Ochran Assassin
ochranassassin.rules_text:
Deathtouch

All creatures able to block Ochran Assassin do so.
ochranassassin.flavor: "The dagger is just the distraction. I carry the real killer in a vial at my side."

erstwhiletrooper.name: Erstwhile Trooper
erstwhiletrooper.rules_text: Discard a creature card: Erstwhile Trooper gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only once per turn.
erstwhiletrooper.flavor:
"The Erstwhile-rotten of body and outmoded in dress, but unfailing in loyalty."
-Vraska

kraulforagers.name: Kraul Foragers
kraulforagers.rules_text: Undergrowth - When Kraul Foragers enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature card in your graveyard.
kraulforagers.flavor:
Feed on food, you eventually rot. Feed on rot, you live forever.
-Kraul saying

moodmarkpainter.name: Moodmark Painter
moodmarkpainter.rules_text: Undergrowth - When Moodmark Painter enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

pitilessgorgon.name: Pitiless Gorgon
pitilessgorgon.flavor: "The reign of the Swarm begins. Let us rise now and dress ourselves in vengeance."

rhizomelurcher.name: Rhizome Lurcher
rhizomelurcher.rules_text: Undergrowth - Rhizome Lurcher enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
rhizomelurcher.flavor:
"The dead gain new purpose here. What is strange in the eyes of the other guilds is harmonious in ours."
-Devesh, Golgari shaman

undercityuprising.name: Undercity Uprising
undercityuprising.rules_text: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Then target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
undercityuprising.flavor:
"Now it's your turn to hide."
	
	- Vraska

vigorsporewurm.name: Vigorspore Wurm
vigorsporewurm.rules_text:
Undergrowth - When Vigorspore Wurm enters the battlefield, target creature gains vigilance and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

Vigorspore Wurm can't be blocked by more than one creature.

marchofthemultitudes.name: March of the Multitudes
marchofthemultitudes.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
marchofthemultitudes.flavor: "Our forces number more than the leaves of Vitu-Ghazi. Do not provoke us."

camaraderie.name: Camaraderie
camaraderie.rules_text: You gain X life and draw C cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
camaraderie.flavor:
"Within the song of Mat'Selesnya, one becomes all."
-Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

joinshields.name: Join Sheilds
joinshields.rules_text: Untap all creatures you control. They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
joinshields.flavor: "We are the shield that never breaks, the bough that never burns, the song that can never be silenced."

knightofautumn.name: Knight of Autumn
knightofautumn.rules_text:
When Knight of Autumn enters the battlefield, choose one -

*Put two +1/+1 counters on Knight of Autumn.

*Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

*You gain 4 life.

sproutingrenewal.name: Sprouting Renewal
sproutingrenewal.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this creature's spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

Choose One -

Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

veneratedloxodon.name: Venerated Loxodon
veneratedloxodon.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

When Venerated Loxodon enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that convoked it.

arboretumelemental.name: Arboretum Elemental
arboretumelemental.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)


Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilites your opponents control.)

conclavetribunal.name: Conclave Tribunal
conclavetribunal.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

flightofequenauts.name: Flight of Equenauts
flightofequenauts.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

Flying
flightofequenauts.flavor: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."

ledevchampion.name: Ledev Champion
ledevchampion.rules_text:
Whenever Ledev Champion attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Ledev Champion gets +1/+1 for each creature tapped this way.

3GW: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

worldsoulcolossus.name: Worldsoul Colossus
worldsoulcolossus.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

Worldsoul Colossus enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

centaurpeacemaker.name: Centaur Peacemaker
centaurpeacemaker.rules_text: When Centaur Peacemaker enters the battlefield, each player gains 4 life.
centaurpeacemaker.flavor: "Please accept this offering. I sincerely hope to leave my mace at my side."

ledevguardian.name: Ledev Guardian
ledevguardian.rules_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)
ledevguardian.flavor: "I've raised her since she was a pup, and she's raised me since I was a recruit."

loxodonrestorer.name: Loxodon Restorer
loxodonrestorer.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

	When Loxodon Restorer enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

packsfavor.name: Pack's Favor
packsfavor.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
packsfavor.flavor: Selesnya grows its ranks in more ways than one.

pauseforreflection.name: Pause for Reflection
pauseforreflection.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

rosemanecentaur.name: Rosemane Centaur
rosemanecentaur.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)


Vigilance
rosemanecentaur.flavor: "I long for peaceful times, when I may tend to my garden instead of our borders."

siegewurm.name: Siege Wurm
siegewurm.rules_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this creature's spell pays for 1 or one mana of that creature's color.)


Trample
siegewurm.flavor: Suddenly, all the haggling didn't seem so important.

sumalawoodshaper.name: Sumala Woodshaper
sumalawoodshaper.rules_text: When Sumala Woodshaper enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

vernadishieldmate.name: Vernadi Shieldmate
vernadishieldmate.flavor: "Selesnya's soil is sacred, and you're about to meet it with your face."

sacredfoundry.name: Sacred Foundry
sacredfoundry.rules_text:
(T: Add R or W.)

As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
sacredfoundry.flavor:
"You will not be trained here. You will be forged."
-Commander Yaszen

borosguildgate.name: Boros Guildgate
borosguildgate.rules_text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.


T: R or W.
borosguildgate.flavor:
"The more trust breaks down, the more we must throw open the front gates."
-Aurelia

steamvents.name: Steam Vents
steamvents.rules_text:
(T: Add U or R.)

As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
steamvents.flavor:
"A massive new Izzet building project with an unstated purpose? Probably fine."
-Zija, Simic mutationist

izzetguildgate.name: Izzet Guildgate
izzetguildgate.rules_text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. 


T: Add U or R.
izzetguildgate.flavor: Every laboratory buzzes with new experiments, each a piece of Ral's ambitious project.

waterygrave.name: Watery Grave
waterygrave.rules_text:
(T: Add U or B.)

As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
waterygrave.flavor: Few believe Duskmantle exists. Fewer find it. None live to bear witness.

dimirguildgate.name: Dimir Guildgate
dimirguildgate.rules_text:
Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.


T: Add U or B.
dimirguildgate.flavor:
"Every guild dreads infiltration. I should know - I've been a member of all of them."
-Lazav

overgrowntomb.name: Overgrown Tomb
overgrowntomb.rules_text:
(T: Add B or G.)

As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
overgrowntomb.flavor: Cradle of the Golgari's new kingdom. Grave of those who wronged its queen.

golgariguildgate.name: Golgari Guildgate
golgariguildgate.rules_text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.

T: Add B or G to your mana pool
golgariguildgate.flavor: "Shut the gates. In the Underrealm we will outlast the coming doom."

templegarden.name: Temple Garden
templegarden.rules_text:
(T: Add G or W.)

As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
templegarden.flavor:
"Where the roots reach, there the temple rises."
-Niszka, Selesnya evangel

selesnyaguildgate.name: Selesnya Guildgate
selesnyaguildgate.rules_text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.


T: Add G or W.
selesnyaguildgate.flavor:
"Everyone who crosses that threshold is our most cherished friend. Everyone who crosses it again is our bitterest enemy."
-Trostani

divinevisitation.name: Divine Visitation
divinevisitation.rules_text: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.
divinevisitation.flavor: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.

bountyagent.name: Bounty Agent
bountyagent.rules_text:
Vigilance

T, Sacrifice Bounty Agent: Destroy target legendary permanent that's an artifact, creature, or enchantment.
bountyagent.flavor: "Lately I've seen the biggest bounties of my career-and for the biggest names."

citywidebust.name: Citywide Bust
citywidebust.rules_text: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.
citywidebust.flavor:
"Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."
-Libuse, Boros sergeant

dawnofhope.name: Dawn of Hope
dawnofhope.rules_text:
Whenever you gain life, you may pay 2. If you do, draw a card.


3W: Create a 1/1 white Soldier token with lifelink.
dawnofhope.flavor:
"To wage war, secure peace within yourself."
-Emmara

crushcontraband.name: Crush Contraband
crushcontraband.rules_text:
Choose one or both - 

*Exile target artifact

*Exile target enchantment.
crushcontraband.flavor: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

demotion.name: Demotion
demotion.rules_text:
Enchant creature 


Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
demotion.flavor: There's no greater honor than joining your chosen guild, and no greater shame than failing it.

girdforbattle.name: Gird for Battle
girdforbattle.rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
girdforbattle.flavor:
"You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart."
-Aurelia

haazdamarshal.name: Haazda Marshal
haazdamarshal.rules_text: Whenever Haazda Marshal and at least two other creatures attack, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.
haazdamarshal.flavor: Ravnica's convoluted power structure often boils down to who can muster the most swords on a given block.

inspiringunicorn.name: Inspiring Unicorn
inspiringunicorn.rules_text: Whenever Inspiring Unicorn attacks, creatures you control +1/+1 until end of turn.
inspiringunicorn.flavor: There are two lives: the life you live before you see a unicorn, and the life you live after.

roccharger.name: Roc Charger
roccharger.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever Roc Charger attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
roccharger.flavor: Roc's innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.

candlelightvigil.name: Candlelight Vigil
candlelightvigil.rules_text:
Enchant creauture


Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has vigilance.
candlelightvigil.flavor: Selesnya guildmages do not sleep so the rest of the conclave can.

collartheculprit.name: Collar the Culprit
collartheculprit.rules_text: Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
collartheculprit.flavor:
"Reports of Gruul rioters in four districts. Start with the big ones and work your way up."

-Libuse, Boros sergeant

healershawk.name: Healer's Hawk
healershawk.flavor: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

huntedwitness.name: Hunted Witness
huntedwitness.rules_text: When Hunted Witness dies, create a 1/1 white Soldier token with lifelink.
huntedwitness.flavor: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals - but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

intrusivepackbeast.name: Intrusive Packbeast
intrusivepackbeast.rules_text:
Vigilance


When Intrusive Packbeast enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.
intrusivepackbeast.flavor: Good at carrying things. Really good at knocking them down.

luminousbonds.name: Luminous Bonds
luminousbonds.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
luminousbonds.flavor:
"Article 5.8.2 Ensure proper restraint of any and all arms, legs, claws, jaws, tails, tentacles, and tendrils as appropriate."
-Azorius Arrester Procedure, Appendix B

righteousblow.name: Righteous Blow
righteousblow.rules_text: Righteous Blow deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
righteousblow.flavor:
"The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserve. On this we agree."
-Tajic

skylinescout.name: Skyline Scout
skylinescout.rules_text: Whenever Skyline Scout attacks, you may pay 1W. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
skylinescout.flavor: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, 'You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

sworncompanions.name: Sworn Companions
sworncompanions.rules_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
sworncompanions.flavor:
"The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."
-Karlov of the Ghost Council

takeheart.name: Take Heart
takeheart.rules_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature you control.
takeheart.flavor: In the quiet before a battle, Boros soldiers whisper prayers that steady their nerves and focus their minds.

tenthdistrictguard.name: Tenth District Guard
tenthdistrictguard.rules_text: When Tenth District Guard enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
tenthdistrictguard.flavor: "The Tenth has always been my home. This city is constantly embroiled in one crisis or another, but I'm determined to protect my piece."

omnispelladept.name: Omnispell Adept
omnispelladept.rules_text: 2U, T: You may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.
omnispelladept.flavor: She memorized every arcane text in the Ismeri Library by the time she was sixteen. Now she quizzes sphinxes in her spare time.

drownedsecrets.name: Drowned Secrets
drownedsecrets.rules_text: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
drownedsecrets.flavor: "Beneath Ravnica's streets runs a layer of tunnels, then caverns and waterways, then terrors and nightmares."

narcomoeba.name: Narcomoeba
narcomoeba.rules_text:
Flying

When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.
narcomoeba.flavor:
"What bait do you cast to catch a dream?"
	- Ravnican riddle

guildsummit.name: Guild Summit
guildsummit.rules_text:
When Guild Summit enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped Gates you control. Draw a card for each Gate tapped this way.



Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
guildsummit.flavor: In a climate of suspicion, Isperia gathered the guilds to propose a radical idea: cooperation.

murmuringmystic.name: Murmuring Mystic
murmuringmystic.rules_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird Illusion creature token with flying.
murmuringmystic.flavor: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.

selectivesnare.name: Selective Snare
selectivesnare.rules_text: Return X target creatures of the creature type of your choice to their owner's hand.
selectivesnare.flavor:
"How thoughtful of the Legion to train its soldiers to fit our spell's specifications."
-Nefara, Dimir agent

capturesphere.name: Capture Sphere
capturesphere.rules_text:
Flash

Enchant creature 

When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

deviouscoverup.name: Devious Cover-Up
deviouscoverup.rules_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard to your library.
deviouscoverup.flavor: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of its disposal.

disdainfulstroke.name: Disdainful Stroke
disdainfulstroke.rules_text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
disdainfulstroke.flavor: "Laws apply only to those who lack the vision to see past them."

leapfrog.name: Leapfrog
leapfrog.rules_text: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.
leapfrog.flavor:
"Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts."
-Yolov, Simic bioengineer

musedrake.name: Muse Drake
musedrake.rules_text:
Flying

When Muse Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card.
musedrake.flavor: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed - except among the drakes.

passwalladept.name: Passwall Adept
passwalladept.rules_text: 2U: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
passwalladept.flavor: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

vedalkenmesmerist.name: Vedalken Mesmerist
vedalkenmesmerist.rules_text: Whenever Vedalken Mesmerist attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
vedalkenmesmerist.flavor: "There's no need to sound the alarm. You are minding your post admirably. I am authorized. All is well."

wallofmist.name: Wall of Mist
wallofmist.flavor: Fog haunts the streets, rendering the familiar as otherworldy, changing neighbors into shadows, and muffling cries for help.

wishcoincrab.name: Wishcoin Crab
wishcoincrab.flavor:
"What wishes do they grant? Mostly pinching-related ones."
-Omik, superintendent of waterworks

gruesomemenagerie.name: Gruesome Menagerie
gruesomemenagerie.rules_text: Choose a creature card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.
gruesomemenagerie.flavor:
"Variety is also the spice of death."
-Cevraya, Golgari shaman

midnightreaper.name: Midnight Reaper
midnightreaper.rules_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
midnightreaper.flavor: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

ritualofsoot.name: Ritual of Soot
ritualofsoot.rules_text: Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.
ritualofsoot.flavor: Only the patrol's armor was found, so tainted with the acrid smell of sudden death that it could never be worn again.

creepingchill.name: Creeping Chill
creepingchill.rules_text:
Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.


When Creeping Chill is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.

kraulswarm.name: Kraul Swarm
kraulswarm.rules_text:
Flying 


2B, Discard a creature card: Return Kraul Swarm from your graveyard to your hand.
kraulswarm.flavor: The hive has a long memory. It knows how every member dies, and to whom it owes the grudge.

pilferingimp.name: Pilfering Imp
pilferingimp.rules_text:
Flying

1B, T, Sacrifice Pilfering Imp: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

plaguecrafter.name: Plaguecrafter
plaguecrafter.rules_text: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.
plaguecrafter.flavor: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."

undercitynecrolisk.name: Undercity Necrolisk
undercitynecrolisk.rules_text: 1, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Undercity Necrolisk. It gains menace until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
undercitynecrolisk.flavor: In its territory, living is an affront.

bartizanbats.name: Bartizan Bats
bartizanbats.flavor:
"Bats are welcome to eat thousands of my pets. I have multitides more that will ultimately eat the bats."
-Izoni

burglarrat.name: Burglar Rat
burglarrat.rules_text: When Burglar Rat enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
burglarrat.flavor:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
-Izoni

childofnight.name: Child of Night
childofnight.rules_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
childofnight.flavor: No guilds - that is her rule. The House vampires unnerve her. The Combine would dissect her, the Legion burn her, the Conclave "cure" her. The shadows are all the family she needs.

deadweight.name: Dead Weight
deadweight.flavor: All things considered, his first day on patrol would have gone better.

douseroflights.name: Douser of Lights

hiredpoisoner.name: Hired Poisoner
hiredpoisoner.flavor: "They don't even feel the cut. I'm ordering a drink in a nearby tavern before anyone notices something's wrong."

neverhappened.name: Never Happened

severedstrands.name: Severed Strands

severedstrands.flavor: "I've seen Ravnica's fate. Believe me, I'm doing you a favor."

spinalcentipede.name: Spinal Centipede

fearlesshalberdier.name: Fearless Halberdier

Trample

goblinlocksmith.name: Goblin Locksmith

soulbrightflamekin.flavor: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

thresherlizard.name: Thresher Lizard
thresherlizard.rules_text: Thresher Lizard gets +1/+2 as long as you have one or fewer cards in hand.
thresherlizard.flavor: The sound of its plated tail beating on desert rocks is often mistaken for the footfalls of a much larger predator.

trumpetblast.name: Trumpet Blast
trumpetblast.rules_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
trumpetblast.flavor: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

uncagedfury.name: Uncaged Fury
uncagedfury.rules_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 amd gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
uncagedfury.flavor: "It's right to fear those that you keep locked away."-Rahilda, Vildin-Pack alpha

treeofredemption.name: Tree of Redemption
treeofredemption.rules_text:
Defender

T: Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness
treeofredemption.flavor: The executioner's tree in Thraben Cathedral holds the power to absolve more than the souls of the hanged.

azusalostbutseeking.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
azusalostbutseeking.rules_text: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.
azusalostbutseeking.flavor: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

courserofkruphix.name: Courser of Kruphix
courserofkruphix.rules_text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.

You may play the top card of your library if it's a land card.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

elvishpiper.name: Elvish Piper
elvishpiper.rules_text: G, T: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
elvishpiper.flavor:
"From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew that world's elves, and the world was silent no more."

- Elvish teaching

livingwish.name: Living Wish
livingwish.rules_text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.
livingwish.flavor: The best wishes include the will to tame their consequences.

proteanhulk.name: Protean Hulk
proteanhulk.rules_text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

summonerspact.name: Summoner's Pact
summonerspact.rules_text:
Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay 2GG. If you don't, you lose the game.

ancientstirrings.name: Ancient Stirrings
ancientstirrings.rules_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest onto the bottom of your library in any order.

broodhatchnantuko.name: Broodhatch Nantuko
broodhatchnantuko.rules_text:
Whenever Broodhatch Nantuko is dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

Morph 2G (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 for 3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

fierceempath.name: Fierce Empath
fierceempath.rules_text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

invigorate.name: Invigorate

If you control a Forest, rather then pay Invigorate's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life.

iwamorioftheopenfist.name: Iwamori of the Open Fist
iwamorioftheopenfist.rules_text:
Trample

kavupredator.name: Kavu Predator
kavupredator.rules_text:
Trample

Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.
kavupredator.flavor: In a withered world, the scent of health prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

krosancolossus.name: Krosan Colossus
krosancolossus.rules_text: Morph 6GG (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for 3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
krosancolossus.flavor: When it walked, it altered geography. When it bellowed, it changed the weather

krosantusker.name: Krosan Tusker
krosantusker.rules_text:
Cycling 2G (2G, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. (Do this before you draw.)

rancor.name: Rancor
rancor.rules_text:
Enchant creature

When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

regrowth.name: Regrowth
regrowth.rules_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

stampededriver.name: Stampede Driver
stampededriver.rules_text: 1G, T, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
stampededriver.flavor: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

utopiasprawl.name: Utopia Sprawl
utopiasprawl.rules_text:
Enchant Forest

As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana of the chosen color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

ambassadoroak.name: Ambassador Oak
ambassadoroak.rules_text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf warrior creature token.
ambassadoroak.flavor: Treefolk and elves share a common interest in the forests, but really the elves just feel at home with the view from above.

ainoksurvivalist.name: Ainok Survivalist
ainoksurvivalist.rules_text:
Megamorph 1G (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for 3. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

elvishaberration.name: Elvish Aberration
elvishaberration.rules_text:
T: Add GGG to your mana pool.
Forestcycling 2 (2, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

echoingcourage.name: Echoing Courage
echoingcourage.rules_text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.
echoingcourage.flavor: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth

cultivate.name: Cultivate

cultivate.flavor: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

colossaldreadmaw.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
colossaldreadmaw.flavor: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

emberweaver.name: Ember Weaver
emberweaver.rules_text:
Reach

As long as you control a red permanent, Ember Weaver gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
emberweaver.flavor:
"Each night, the sun unravels and blows away. Each day, the spiders set a new one in the sky."
--Sunseeder myth

epicconfrontation.name: Epic Confrontation

epicconfrontation.flavor: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

giantgrowth.name: Giant Growth
giantgrowth.rules_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
giantgrowth.flavor:
"Only the most effective tactics stand the test of time."

- Gamelen, Citamul elder

kavuclimber.name: Kavu Climber
kavuclimber.rules_text: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.
kavuclimber.flavor:
The kavu might be above you
-Llanowar expression "keep an open mind"

lull.name: Lull
lull.rules_text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

Cycling 2 (2, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
lull.flavor: The clamor of was ceased as both armies stood and marveled at the beauty of Gaea's work.

nettlesentinel.name: Nettle Sentinel
nettlesentinel.rules_text:
Nettle Sentinel doesn't untap during your untap step.

Whenever you cast a green spell, you may untap Nettle Sentinel.
nettlesentinel.flavor: Though Shadowmoor's monster-haunted wilds beckon, she never leaves her post.

plummet.name: Plummet
plummet.flavor:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
-Dejara, Giltwood druid

presenceofgond.name: Presence of Gond
presenceofgond.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has "T: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token."
presenceofgond.flavor: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

timberpackwolf.name: Timberpack Wolf
timberpackwolf.rules_text: Timberpack Wolf has +1/+1 for each other creature named Timberpack Wolf
timberpackwolf.flavor: Their strength is no mere numbers game. An intangible force augments the wolves when they run together.

vesselofnascency.name: Vessel of Nascency

wildheartinvoker.name: Wildheart Invoker
wildheartinvoker.rules_text: 8: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
wildheartinvoker.flavor:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
-The Invoker's Tales

woollyloxodon.name: Woolly Loxodon
woollyloxodon.rules_text: Morph 5G (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for 3. Turn it face up at any time for its morph cost.)
woollyloxodon.flavor: Even among the hardiest warriors of the Temur, loxodons are respected for their adaptation to the mountain snows.

animarsoulofelements.name: Animar, Soul of Elements
animarsoulofelements.rules_text:
Protection from white and from black
Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements. Creature spells you cast cost 1 less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

giselabladeofgoldnight.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight

Flying, first strike

If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.

If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

prosshskyraiderofkher.name: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher
prosshskyraiderofkher.rules_text:
Flying

brionstoutarm.name: Brion Stoutarm

Lifelink

conflux.name: Conflux

eladamriscall.name: Eladamri's Call
eladamriscall.rules_text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
eladamriscall.flavor: Tribal rivalries and petty disputes were laid aside at Eladamri's summons.

grenzodungeonwarden.name: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden
grenzodungeonwarden.rules_text:
Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

2: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

hannashipsnavigator.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator

hannashipsnavigator.flavor: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

mysticsnake.name: Mystic Snake
mysticsnake.rules_text:
Flash

When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

nicolbolas.name: Nicol Bolas
nicolbolas.rules_text:
Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay UBR.

Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.

nivmizzetthefiremind.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
nivmizzetthefiremind.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
T: Draw a card.

notionthief.name: Notion Thief
notionthief.rules_text:
Flash

If an opponent would draw a card except for the first one he or she draws in each of his or her draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

perniciousdeed.rules_text: X, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
perniciousdeed.flavor: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

ruricthartheunbowed.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed

Vigilance, reach

Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

balothnull.name: Baloth Null
balothnull.rules_text: When Baloth Null enters the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

"Humans use pigs to hunt for mushrooms, don't they? It's like that."

- Harak, Malakir bloodwitch

blightning.name: Blightning

cloudblazer.name: Cloudblazer
cloudblazer.rules_text:
Flying

cloudblazer.flavor: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

lorescalecoatl.name: Lorescale Coatl

lorescalecoatl.flavor:
"The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales."

-Ranalus, vedalken heretic

pilloryofthesleepless.name: Pillory of the Sleepless

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."
pilloryofthesleepless.flavor: Which is worse - the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

quicksilverdagger.name: Quicksilver Dagger
quicksilverdagger.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has "T: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."
quicksilverdagger.flavor: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

shadowmageinfiltrator.name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
shadowmageinfiltrator.rules_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

watchwolf.name: Watchwolf

"When I said I needed a hand, I didn't mean this."

- Gerrard Capashen

strionicresonator.name: Strionic Resonator

heavyarbalest.name: Heavy Arbalest

Equip 4

propheticprism.rules_text:
When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.

1, T: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
propheticprism.flavor: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

saioftheshinobi.name: Sai of the Shinobi

Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Sai of the Shinobi to it.

Equip 2
saioftheshinobi.flavor: The passing of the sai presages the end of the old clan and the ascent of the new.

swiftfootboots.name: Swiftfoot Boots
swiftfootboots.rules_text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.

Equip 1
swiftfootboots.flavor:
"There is great wisdom in rushing headlong into combat... if you're prepared."
-Kenjek, captain of the Thousand Swords

treasurekeeper.name: Treasure Keeper

assemblyworker.rules_text: T: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

nihilspellbomb.rules_text:
T, Sacrifice Nihil Spellbomb: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

When Nihil Spellbomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay B. If you do, draw a card.

mikokorocenterofthesea.name: Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
mikokorocenterofthesea.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

2, T: Each player draws a card.

"Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed."
-Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

pendelhaven.name: Pendelhaven
pendelhaven.rules_text:
T: Add G to your mana pool. 
T: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
pendelhaven.flavor: The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.

rishadanport.name: Rishadan Port
rishadanport.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

1, T: Tap target land.

cascadebluffs.name: Cascade Bluffs
cascadebluffs.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ yo your mana pool.

[U/R] T, Add UU, UR, or RR to your mana pool.

fetidheath.name: Fetid Heath

T: Add ◊ yo your mana pool.

[W/B] T, Add WW, WB, or BB to your mana pool.
fetidheath.flavor:
"Do not linger in such places, child. There the gwyllions dance. If they find you, you will join in their revels for eternity."

T: Add ◊ yo your mana pool.

[G/U] T, Add GG, GU, or UU to your mana pool.

T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

[R/W], T: Add RR, RW, or WW to your mana pool.

twilightmire.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ yo your mana pool.

[B/G] T, Add BB, BG, or GG to your mana pool.
twilightmire.flavor: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

ashbarrens.name: Ash Barrens
ashbarrens.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

Basic landcycling 1 (1, discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

mishrasfactory.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

myriadlandscape.rules_text:

quicksand.name: Quicksand
quicksand.rules_text:
T:Add ◊ to your mana pool.

zoeticcavern.name: Zoetic Cavern

T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

Morph 2 (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for 3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

hauntedfengraf.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

narumehamasterwizard.rules_text:
Flash

jayaballard.name: Jaya Ballard

(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)

Exile all nonland permanents that aren't legendary.

karnstemporalsundering.name: Karn's Temporal Sundering
karnstemporalsundering.rules_text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)

Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Exile Karn's Temporal Sundering.

yawgmothsvileoffering.name: Yawgmoth's Vile Offering
yawgmothsvileoffering.rules_text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)

Put up to one target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Destroy up to one target creature or planeswalker. Exile Yawgmoth's Vile Offering.
yawgmothsvileoffering.flavor: Centuries ago, a mad god offered a simple trade.

jayasimmolatinginferno.name: Jaya's Immolating Inferno
jayasimmolatinginferno.rules_text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)

Jaya's Immolating Inferno deals X damage to each of up to three targets.
jayasimmolatinginferno.flavor: Centuries ago, a pyromancer's spark ignited a fiery conflagration.

kamahlsdruidicvow.name: Kamahl's Druidic Vow
kamahlsdruidicvow.rules_text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)
Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of land and/or legendary permanent cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.
kamahlsdruidicvow.flavor: Centuries ago, a barbarian laid his rage to rest.

benalishmarshal.name: Benalish Marshal
benalishmarshal.flavor:
"Some aspire to climb the mountain of Honor. The Benalish are born upon its peak, and from there ascend among the stars."
-History of Benalia

tempestdjinn.name: Tempest Djinn
tempestdjinn.rules_text:
Flying

Tempest Djinn gets +1/+0 for each basic Island you control.
tempestdjinn.flavor: The first to arrive on Dominaria from their distant home, the marids are the oldest tribe of djinn and the most respected by storm and sea.

dreadshade.name: Dread Shade
dreadshade.rules_text: B: Dread Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
dreadshade.flavor:
"The forest surrounding the Vess estate bacame the Caligo Morass, a vast bog stalked by horrors too terrible to name."
-"The Fall of the House of Vess"

goblinchainwhirler.name: Goblin Chainwhirler
goblinchainwhirler.rules_text:
First strike
When Goblin Chainwhirler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.
goblinchainwhirler.flavor: "The trick is, once you get moving, don't stop!"

steelleafchampion.name: Steel Leaf Champion
steelleafchampion.rules_text: Steel Leaf Champion can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
steelleafchampion.flavor: One eye open to see the truth of the world. One eye covered to gaze at the goddess within.

historyofbenalia.name: History of Benalia
historyofbenalia.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I, II - Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

III - Knights you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

fallofthethran.name: Fall of the Thran
fallofthethran.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice afters III.)

I - Destroy all lands.

II, III - Each player returns two land cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

triumphofgerrard.name: Triumph of Gerrard
triumphofgerrard.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I, II - Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with the greatest power.

III - Target creature you control with the greatest power gains flying, first strike, and lifelink until end of turn.

theantiquitieswar.name: The Antiquities War
theantiquitieswar.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I, II - Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

III - Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

themirariconjecture.name: The Mirari Conjecture
themirariconjecture.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I - Return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

II - Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

III - Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

timeofice.name: Time of Ice
timeofice.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I, II - Tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Time of Ice.

III - Return all tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

phyrexianscriptures.name: Phyrexian Scriptures
phyrexianscriptures.rules_text:
I - Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

II - Destroy all nonartifact creatures.

III - Exile all cards from all opponents' graveyards.

riteofbelzenlok.name: Rite of Belzenlok
riteofbelzenlok.rules_text:
(as this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)


I, II - Create two 0/1 black Cleric creature tokens.

III - Create a 6/6 black Demon creature token with flying, trample, and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice another creature. If you can't, this creature deals 6 damage to you."

chainerstorment.name: Chainer's Torment
chainerstorment.rules_text:
(As this saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I, II - Chainer's Torment deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

III - Create a X/X black Nightmare Horror creature token, where X is half your life total, rounded up. It deals X damage to you.

theeldestreborn.name: The Eldest Reborn
theeldestreborn.rules_text:
(As this saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I - Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.

II - Each opponent discards a card.

III - Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

thefirsteruption.name: The First Eruption
thefirsteruption.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I - The First Eruption deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
II - Add RR.
III - Sacrifice a Mountain. If you do, The First Eruption deals 3 damage to each creature.

theflameofkeld.name: The Flame of Keld
theflameofkeld.rules_text:
As this Saga enters the battlefield and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I -  Discard your hand. II - Draw two cards.
III - If a red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

themendingofdominaria.name: The Mending of Dominaria
themendingofdominaria.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I, II - Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

III - Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

songoffreyalise.name: Song of Freyalise
songoffreyalise.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I, II - Until your next turn, creatures you control gain "T: Add one mana of any color."
III - Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance, trample, and indestructible until end of turn.

evrahalcyonwitness.name: Evra, Halcyon Witness
evrahalcyonwitness.rules_text:
Lifelink

4: Exchange your life total with Evra, Halcyon Witness's power.
evrahalcyonwitness.flavor:
"Light from the Null Moon took form- a mirage made real, alone in grandeur, isolated in a world that once had been its own."
-Fall of the Thran

shalaivoiceofplenty.name: Shalai, Voice of Plenty
shalaivoiceofplenty.rules_text:
Flying


You, planeswalkers you control, and other creatures you control have hexproof. 4GG: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

tesharancestorsapostle.rules_text:
Flying

bairdstewardofargive.name: Baird, Steward of Argive
bairdstewardofargive.rules_text:

Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays 1 for each of those creatures.

danithacapashenparagon.name: Danitha Capashen, Paragon
danithacapashenparagon.rules_text:
First strike, vigilance, lifelink

Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost 1 less to cast.
danithacapashenparagon.flavor: "I will protect the less fortunate. I will love bravely. I will face despair and fight on. As a Capashen, I can do no less.

kwendeprideoffemeref.name: Kwende, Pride of Femeref
kwendeprideoffemeref.rules_text:
Double strike

Creatures you control with first strike have double strike.
kwendeprideoffemeref.flavor: Descendant of a vanished land, student of a forgotten general, and master of blades no smith could forge anew. He honors them all by living a life worthy of song.

onserraswings.name: On Serra's Wings
onserraswings.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1, and has flying, vigilance, and lifelink.
onserraswings.flavor:
"The spirit of Serra raised Brindri high and commanded her to keep the balance."
-Song of All, canto 524

daringarchaeologist.name: Daring Archaeologist

When Daring Archaeologist enters the battlefield, you may return an artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

boardtheweatherlight.name: Board the Weatherlight
boardtheweatherlight.rules_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a historic card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

dauntlessbodyguard.name: Dauntless Bodyguard

As Dauntless Bodyguard enters the battlefield, choose another creature you control.

knightofgrace.name: Knight of Grace

First strike

Hexproof from black (This creature can't be the target of black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

sanctumspirit.name: Sanctum Spirit
sanctumspirit.rules_text:
Lifelink

Discard a historic card: Sanctum Spirit gains indestructible until end of turn. (Artifact, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
sanctumspirit.flavor:
"When history becomes too mournful, even good souls may choose to forget."
 -Shalai, voice of Plenty

sealaway.name: Seal Away

sealaway.flavor: An ancient nemesis rendered harmless long ago.

serraangel.name: Serra Angel

adamantwill.name: Adamant Will
adamantwill.rules_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
adamantwill.flavor: The shield took a year to craft, a month to enchant, and a decade to master - all for one glorious moment.

avensentry.name: Aven Sentry
avensentry.flavor: "My flock flew from a distant continent ruined by cataclysm and war. Benalia gave us shelter to end our exodus."

benalishhonorguard.name: Benalish Honor Guard
benalishhonorguard.rules_text: Benalish Honor Guard gets +1/+0 for each legendary creature you control.
benalishhonorguard.flavor:
"The true measure of all heroes is not what they achieve, but who they inspire."
-Triumph of Gerrard

blessedlight.name: Blessed Light
blessedlight.flavor: Enchanted by mage-smiths and blessed by priests, Benalish windows let in light and cast out darkness.

callthecavalry.name: Call the Cavalry
callthecavalry.rules_text: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
callthecavalry.flavor: Benalish citizens born under the same constellations share a star-clan. Their loyalty to one another interlaces the Seven Houses.

charge.name: Charge
charge.rules_text: Creature you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
charge.flavor:
"Honor rides before us. All we have to do is catch up."
-Danitha Capashen

davenanttrapper.name: D'Avenant Trapper
davenanttrapper.rules_text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, tap target creature an opponent controls. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
davenanttrapper.flavor: "Go swiftly, clever arrow and teach The philosophy of stillness." D'Avenant verse

dub.name: Dub
dub.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has first strike, and is a Knight in addition to its other types.

excavationelephant.name: Excavation Elephant
excavationelephant.rules_text:
Kicker 1W (You may pay an additional 1W as you cast this spell.)
When Excavation Elephant enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

gideonsreproach.name: Gideon's Reproach
gideonsreproach.rules_text: Gideon's Reproach deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

healinggrace.name: Healing Grace

"Whatever faith you have in Serra, she has more in you."

-Song of All, canto 1008

knightofnewbenalia.name: Knight of New Benalia

mesaunicorn.name: Mesa Unicorn
mesaunicorn.flavor: The unicorns of Sursi are a manifestation of Serra's joy and compassion. They frolic and dance like children, offering blessings to anyone they encounter.

pegasuscourser.name: Pegasus Courser
pegasuscourser.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Pegasus Courser attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

sergeantatarms.name: Sergeant-at-Arms
sergeantatarms.rules_text:
Kicker 2W (You may pay an additional 2W as you cast this spell.)

When Sergeant-at-Arms enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

serradisciple.name: Serra Disciple

Flying, first strike

tragicpoet.flavor: "In a healing world I write - I, who will never be healed. Let my last gift be one of memory: from a thousand lost thoughts, choose one, and remember my name.

nabandeanofiteration.name: Naban, Dean of Iteration
nabandeanofiteration.rules_text: If a Wizard entering the battlefield under your control causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

zahiddjinnofthelamp.name: Zahid, Djinn of the Lamp
zahiddjinnofthelamp.rules_text:
You may pay 3U and tap an untapped artifact you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

Flying
zahiddjinnofthelamp.flavor: "I do as I please, little mortal. Do go on about your wishes, though-they amuse me to no end."

slinnvodatherisingdeep.name: Slinn Voda, the Rising Deep
slinnvodatherisingdeep.rules_text:
Kicker 1U (You may pay an additional 1U as you cast this spell.)

tetsukoumezawafugitive.name: Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive

precognitionfield.name: Precognition Field
precognitionfield.rules_text:
You may look at the top card of your library. (You may do this at any time.)

You may cast the top card of your library if it's an instant or sorcery card.

3: Exile the top card of your library.

curatorsward.rules_text:
Enchant permanent

Enchanted permanent has hexproof.

When enchanted permanent leaves the battlefield, if it was historic, draw two cards. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

inbolassclutches.name: In Bolas's Clutches

Enchant permanent

You control enchanted permanent.

Enchanted permanent is legendary.
inbolassclutches.flavor:
"Your contract is in default. You belong to me now. Serve, or die."
-Nicol Bolas

merfolktrickster.name: Merfolk Trickster
merfolktrickster.rules_text:
Flash

When Merfolk Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It loses all abilities until end of turn.

sageoflatnam.name: Sage of Lat-Nam
sageoflatnam.rules_text: T, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
sageoflatnam.flavor: Though it was laid to waste by the brothers, many schools of magic trace their origins to the College of Lat-Nam, including the first Tolarian Academy.

sentinelofthepearltrident.name: Sentinel of the Pearl Trident
sentinelofthepearltrident.rules_text:
Flash

wizardsretort.name: Wizard's Retort
wizardsretort.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast if you control a Wizard.

Counter target spell.

"The second mage learned to dissipate blasts of lightning. Threat and response: thus did the study of magic progress."
-Naban, dean of iteration

academydrake.name: Academy Drake
academydrake.rules_text:
Kicker 4 (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.)

Flying

If Academy Drake was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

academyjourneymage.name: Academy Journeymage

This spell costs 1 less to cast if you control a Wizard.

academyjourneymage.flavor: "We don't choose who comes here. We choose how long they stay."

arcaneflight.name: Arcane Flight
arcaneflight.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
arcaneflight.flavor: The Tolarian Academies are known for their magical research, powerful sorcerers, and accidental destruction of ecosystems.

artificersassistant.name: Artificer's Assisstant
artificersassistant.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever you cast a historic spell, scry 1. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic. To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

befuddle.name: Befuddle
befuddle.rules_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

Draw a card.
befuddle.flavor: "The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still. I learned that from Radha."

blinkofaneye.name: Blink of an Eye
blinkofaneye.rules_text:
Kicker 1U (You may pay an additional 1U as you cast this spell.)

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

cloudreadersphinx.name: Cloudreader Sphinx
cloudreadersphinx.rules_text:
Flying

When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

coldwatersnapper.name: Cold-Water Snapper
coldwatersnapper.rules_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
coldwatersnapper.flavor: For generations, the inhabitants of Orvada have hungered for turtle soup. For generations, the turtles have frustrated their ambitions.

deepfreeze.name: Deep Freeze

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/4, has defender, loses all other abilities, and is a blue Wall in addition to its other colors and types.
deepfreeze.flavor: For cryomancers, studying the Ice age isn't just an academic exercise."

divination.name: Divination
divination.flavor:
"Half your studies will be learning the laws od magic. The other half will be bending them."

- Naru Meha, master wizard

homaridexplorer.name: Homarid Explorer

homaridexplorer.flavor:

-Time of Ice

opt.name: Opt
opt.rules_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)



Draw a card.
opt.flavor: The crystal pulsed with the power of Teferi's planeswalker spark. Had Jhoira given him a blessing or a curse?

relicrunner.name: Relic Runner
relicrunner.rules_text: Relic Runner can't be blocked if you've cast a historic spell this turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
relicrunner.flavor: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.rules_text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
rescue.flavor: With just a few seconds to escape, Deryan saved Hurkyl's editions on restoring pysical objects from ash.

syncopate.name: Syncopate

syncopate.flavor: The first spell stuttered and broke. Its pieces reached Teferi out of rhythm, meaningless.

tolarianscholar.name: Tolarian Scholar
tolarianscholar.flavor: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kings of experiemnts that ruined the original island of Tolaria.

unwind.name: Unwind
unwind.rules_text: Counter target noncreature spell. Untap up to three lands.
unwind.flavor:
"A problem is only a problem if you don't have the tools to correct it."
-Jhoira

vodalianarcanist.name: Vodalian Arcanist

vodalianarcanist.flavor: The Vodalian Empire tends to be insular. The scholarly Volshe caste are the exception, using eductation as an antidote to xenophobia.

josuvesslichknight.name: Josu Vess, Lich Knight
josuvesslichknight.rules_text:
Kicker 5B (You may pay an additional 5B as you cast this spell.)
Menace
When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Knight creature tokens with menace.

kazarovsengirpureblood.name: Kazarov, Sengir Pureblood
kazarovsengirpureblood.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on Kazarov, Sengir Pureblood. 

3R: Kazarov deals 2 damage to target creature.

lichsmastery.name: Lich's Mastery
lichsmastery.rules_text:
Hexproof

You can't lose the game. 

Whenever you gain life, draw that many cards.

Whenever you lose life, for each 1 life you lost, exile a permanent you control or a card from your hand or graveyard.

When Lich's Mastery leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

torgaarfamineincarnate.name: Torgaar, Famine Incarnate
torgaarfamineincarnate.rules_text:

urgorostheemptyone.name: Urgoros, the Empty One
