Flying

Whenever Urgoros, the Empty One deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card at random. If the player can't, you draw a card.
urgorostheemptyone.flavor: As the phantom flies overhead, the city of Vhelnish screams in silence.

whisperbloodliturgist.name: Whisper, Blood Liturgist
whisperbloodliturgist.rules_text: T, Sacrifice two creatures: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
whisperbloodliturgist.flavor: "Look how they beg for the knife! The Demonlord has trained them well."

yarglegluttonofurborg.name: Yargle, Glutton of Urborg
yarglegluttonofurborg.flavor: When Belzenlok's lieutenant Yar-Kul grew too ambitious, the Demonlord transformed him into a maggot. The frog that ate the maggot grew and grew, until a ravenous spirit burst from its body.

castdown.name: Cast Down
castdown.flavor:
"Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."
-Chainer's Torment

finalparting.name: Final Parting
finalparting.rules_text: Search your library for two cards. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.
finalparting.flavor:
"Sleep now, brother. That is one gift I can give you."
-Liliana Vess

knightofmalice.name: Knight of Malice
knightofmalice.rules_text:
First strike

Hexproof from white(This creature can't be the target of white spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Knight of Malice gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a white permanent.
knightofmalice.flavor: A shadow to swallow the light.

lingeringphantom.name: Lingering Phantom
lingeringphantom.rules_text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may pay B. If you do, return Lingering Phantom from your graveyard to your hand. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
lingeringphantom.flavor:
"True power never dies, but lies awake, waiting for its name to be spoken."

-The Eldest Reborn

settlethescore.name: Settle the Score
settlethescore.rules_text: Exile target creature. Put two loyalty counters on a planeswalker you control.
settlethescore.flavor:
"You bound me with a contract only your death could end- and you thought me the fool?"
-Liliana Vess

thallidsoothsayer.name: Thallid Soothsayer
thallidsoothsayer.rules_text: 2, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
thallidsoothsayer.flavor: Some of the thallids that escaped into the fens of Urborg began emulating the Cabal's bloodsoaked rituals in their own peculiar way.

blessingofbelzenlok.name: Blessing of Belzenlok
blessingofbelzenlok.rules_text: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn. If it's legendary, it also gains lifelink until end of turn.
blessingofbelzenlok.flavor:
"My heart is not mine, it is Belzenlok's. All hearts are his, and all blood."
-"Rite of Belzenlok"

cabalevangel.name: Cabal Evangel
cabalevangel.flavor: "All hail the Demonlord Belzenlok, Evincar of the Stronghold, Scion of the Darkness, Doom of Fools, Lord of the Wastes, Master of the Ebon Hand, Eternal Patriarch of the Cabel..."

cabalpaladin.name: Cabal Paladin
cabalpaladin.rules_text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, Cabal Paladin deals 2 damage to each opponent. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
cabalpaladin.flavor:
"The Demonlord has ruled every age. Every ruin, myth, and nightmare proves his power."
-"Rite of Belzenlok"

caligoskinwitch.name: Caligo Skin-Witch
caligoskinwitch.rules_text:
Kicker 3B You may pay an additional 3B as you cast this spell.)


When Caligo Skin-Witch enters the battlefield, if it was kicked each opponent discards two cards.
caligoskinwitch.flavor: "Take their faces. The lips of these unbelievers may yet honor the Demonlord."

darkbargain.name: Dark Bargain
darkbargain.rules_text: Look at the top three card of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other two into your graveyard. Dark Bargain deals 2 damage to you.
darkbargain.flavor: "I have pustules of the great Ratadrabik, very cheap. No? Surely you'll want a tincture of Nevinyrral's pulverized remains. Genuine!"

deathbloomthallid.name: Deathbloom Thallid
deathbloomthallid.rules_text: When Deathbloom Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
deathbloomthallid.flavor:
"Nature is not always gentle or kind, but all life begets life."
-Marwyn of Llanowar

demonicvigor.name: Demonic Vigor
demonicvigor.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.
demonicvigor.flavor: In the Cabal, death is just another mark of devotion.

divest.name: Divest
divest.rules_text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.
divest.flavor: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.

drudgesentinel.name: Drudge Sentinel
drudgesentinel.rules_text: 3: Tap Drudge Sentinel. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
drudgesentinel.flavor: The Cabal assured the Seven Houses that hostages receive all the food and rest they require.

eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
eviscerate.flavor:
"Fear the dark if you must, but don't mistake sunlight for safety."
-Josu Vess

feralabomination.name: Feral Abomination
feralabomination.flavor:
"Urborg used to be lovely-scenic volcanoes, respectable lich lords. Since the Cabal came with their nightmares and thrulls, it's all gone to the worms."
-Mister Lostspoons, Skulltown gossip

fungalinfection.name: Fungal Infection
fungalinfection.rules_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
fungalinfection.flavor: To thallids, the whole world is just a pile of mulch to grow saprolings in.

ratcolony.name: Rat Colony
ratcolony.rules_text:
Rat Colony gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control.

A deck can have any number of cards names Rat Colony.
ratcolony.flavor: Wreckage from the Phyrexian Invasion provided the rats with a seemingly unlimited number of breeding grounds.

soulsalvage.name: Soul Salvage
soulsalvage.rules_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
soulsalvage.flavor: The first mistake the Grimmnant knights made was bullying the owner of an Urborg corpse shop. Their second mistake was dying.

strongholdconfessor.name: Stronghold Confessor
strongholdconfessor.rules_text:
Kicker 3 (You may pay and additional 3 as you cast this spell.)

Menace(This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

If Stronghold Confessor was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

thallidomnivore.name: Thallid Omnivore
thallidomnivore.rules_text: 1, Sacrifice another creature: Thallid Omnivore gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If a Saproling was sacrificed this way, you gain 2 life.
thallidomnivore.flavor: Thelon of Havenwood created thallids as a food source in times of darkness. Thallids did the same with saprolings.

viciousoffering.name: Vicious Offering
viciousoffering.rules_text:
Kicker - Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)

Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.

windgraceacolyte.name: Windgrace Acolyte
windgraceacolyte.rules_text:
Flying

When Windgrace Acolyte enters the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard and you gain 3 life.
windgraceacolyte.flavor: Acolytes if the lost Lord Windgrace fight to keep Urborg relics out of Cabal hands.

verixbladewing.name: Verix Bladewing
verixbladewing.rules_text:
Kicker 3 (You may pay an additional 3 as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Verix Bladewing enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create Karox Bladewing, a legendary 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

squeetheimmortal.name: Squee, the Immortal
squeetheimmortal.rules_text: You may cast Squee, the Immortal from your graveyard or from exile.
squeetheimmortal.flavor: "You gotta be pretty smart to live long as me, but not being able to die helps."

valdukkeeperoftheflame.name: Valduk- Keeper of the Flame
valdukkeeperoftheflame.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each Aura and Equipment attached to Valduk, Keeper of the Flame, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

haphazardbombardment.name: Haphazard Bombardment
haphazardbombardment.rules_text:
When Haphazard Bombardment enters the battlefield, choose four nonenchantment permanents you don't control and put an aim counter on each of them.

At the beginning of your end step, if two or more permanents you don't control have an aim counter on them, destroy on of those permanents at random.

siegegangcommander.name: Siege-Gang Commander
siegegangcommander.rules_text:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
1R, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

twoheadedgiant.name: Two-Headed Giant
twoheadedgiant.rules_text: Whenever Two-Headed Giant attacks, flip two coins. If both come up heads, Two-Headed Giant gains double strike until end of turn. If both come up tails, Two-Headed Giant gains menace until end of turn.
twoheadedgiant.flavor: He watches the pass in both directions, and all must pay his toll.

championoftheflame.name: Champion of the Flame
championoftheflame.rules_text:
Trample

Champion of the Flame gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
championoftheflame.flavor: Grand Warlord Radha's challengers are always defeated, but she rewards the most passionate with the Flame of Keld. After that, they burn for her.

fightwithfire.name: Fight with Fire
fightwithfire.rules_text:
Kicker 5R (You may pay an additional 5R as you cast this spell.)
Fight with Fire deals 5 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it deals 10 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets instead.(Those targets can include players and planeswalkers.)

firefistadept.name: Firefist Adept
firefistadept.rules_text: When Firefist Adept enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of Wizards you control.
firefistadept.flavor: The versatile "fiery gauntlet" is among the first spells young Ghitu mages learn.

goblinbarrage.name: Goblin Barrage
goblinbarrage.rules_text:
Kicker - Sacrifice an artifact or Goblin. (You may sacrifice an artifact or Goblin as you cast this spell.)
Goblin Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it also deals 4 damage to target plater or planeswalker.

goblinwarchief.name: Goblin Warchief
goblinwarchief.rules_text:
Goblin spells you cast cost 1 less to cast.

Goblin creatures you control have haste.
goblinwarchief.flavor: Not since the days of Pashalik Mons have the Rundvelt goblins been so united or effective.

orcishvandal.name: Orcish Vandal
orcishvandal.rules_text: T, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Vandal deals 2 damage to any target.
orcishvandal.flavor: Every ancient relic is a weapon if you throw it hard enough.

skizzik.name: Skizzik
skizzik.rules_text:
Kicker R (You may pay an additional R as you cast this spell.)

Trample, haste

At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Skizzik unless it was kicked.

warcryphoenix.name: Warcry Phoenix
warcryphoenix.rules_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you may pay 2R. If you do, return Warcry Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.
warcryphoenix.flavor: War begins with one red ember.

wizardslightning.name: Wizard's Lightning
wizardslightning.rules_text:
This spell costs 2 less to cast if you control a Wizard.

Wizard's Lightning deals 3 damage to any one target.
wizardslightning.flavor:
"The study of magic began when the first mage taught herself to through lightning."
-Naban, dean of iteration

bloodstonegoblin.name: Bloodstone Goblin
bloodstonegoblin.rules_text: Whenever you cast a spell, if that spell was kicked, Bloodstone Goblin gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
bloodstonegoblin.flavor: The stone whispers tales of darkness and fire. She replies, "Tell me more."

ferventstrike.name: Fervent Strike
ferventstrike.rules_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
ferventstrike.flavor:
"The flame paints a bright wheel on the sky, then shifts into a stabbing spark. The enemy falls; the smoke of victory rises."
-"Legends of the Firedancer"

fieryintervention.name: Fiery Intervention
fieryintervention.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Fiery Intervention deals 5 damage to target creature.

* Destroy target artifact.
fieryintervention.flavor: Burning something is easy. Choosing a target can be more difficult.

fireelemental.name: Fire Elemental
fireelemental.flavor:
"The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it."
-Jaya Ballard

frenziedrage.name: Frenzied Rage
frenziedrage.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
frenziedrage.flavor:
"The heat in our hearts sometimes rises to the surface."
-Valduk, keeper of the Flame

ghituchronicler.name: Ghitu Chronicler
ghituchronicler.rules_text:
Kicker 3R (You may pay an additional 3R as you cast this spell.)

When Ghitu Chronicler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

ghitujourneymage.name: Ghitu Journeymage
ghitujourneymage.rules_text: When Ghitu Journeymage enters the battlefield, if you control another Wizard, Ghitu Journeymage deals 2 damage to each opponent.
ghitujourneymage.flavor: The Ghitu of Shiv are as fierce and uncompromising as their volcanic home.

ghitulavarunner.name: Ghitu Lavarunner
ghitulavarunner.rules_text: As long as there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ghitu Lavarunner gets +1/+0 and has haste.
ghitulavarunner.flavor: Tolarians teach the history of pyromancy. The Ghitu prefer applied research.

keldonoverseer.name: Keldon Overseer
keldonoverseer.rules_text:
Kicker 3R (You may pay an additional 3R as you cast this spell.)
Haste
When Keldon Overseer enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

keldonraider.name: Keldon Raider
keldonraider.rules_text: When Keldon Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
keldonraider.flavor: Keldon raiders' spoils are limited to what their colos can carry. No matter the value, the rest goes up in smoke.

keldonwarcaller.name: Keldon Warcaller
keldonwarcaller.rules_text: Whenever Keldon Warcaller attacks, put a lore counter on target Saga you control.
keldonwarcaller.flavor:
"The Mountain gave the Flame to Kradak to light the furnaces of his people's hearts. The wanderers became Keldons, and he the first warlord."
-"The Flame of Keld"

radiatinglightning.name: Radiating Lightning
radiatinglightning.rules_text: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.
radiatinglightning.flavor: As the Cabal legions pushed into Shiv, they learned not to stand so close together.

rampagingcyclops.name: Rampaging Cyclops
rampagingcyclops.rules_text: Rampaging Cyclops gets -2/-0 as long as two or more creatures are blocking it.
rampagingcyclops.flavor: Keldon warriors take advantage of the cyclops's inability to focus on more than one thing at a time.

runamok.name: Run Amok
runamok.rules_text: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3. and gains trample until end of turn.
runamok.flavor: Keld faced an apocalypse to fulfill a dire prophecy. Now Keldons have nothing left to believe in except themselves.

seismicshift.name: Seismic Shift
seismicshift.rules_text: Destroy target land. Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.
seismicshift.flavor: "Shiv is a restless land. It heaves ash, bleeds lava, and scabs over in black obsidian."

shivanfire.name: Shivan Fire
shivanfire.rules_text:
Kicker 4 (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.)

Shivan Fire deals 2 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to that creature instead.
shivanfire.flavor: Sometimes Shivan dragons toy with their food. Other times they just cook it.

skirkprospector.name: Skirk Prospector
skirkprospector.flavor: Deep beneath the ruined centinent of Otaria, there's a mine where goblins still work, ignorant of the destruction above.

warlordsfury.name: Warlord's Fury
warlordsfury.rules_text:
Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
warlordsfury.flavor:
"The old ways were for a winter world. We do what's best for us, not for the past. We are Keldons!"
-Grand Warlord Radha

marwynthenurturer.name: Marwyn, the Nurturer
marwynthenurturer.rules_text:
Whenver another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Marwyn, the Nurturer.
T: Add an amount of G equal to Marwyn's power.
marwynthenurturer.flavor: Midwife to mothers and leader to all.

grunnthelonelyking.name: Grunn, the Lonely King
grunnthelonelyking.rules_text:
Kicker 3 (You may pay an additional 3 as you cast this spell.)
If Grunn, the Lonely King was kicked, it enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Grunn attacks alone, double its power and toughness until end of turn.

sylvanawakening.name: Sylvan Awakening
sylvanawakening.rules_text: Until your next turn, all lands you control become 2/2 Elemental creatures with reach, indestructible, and haste. They're still lands.
sylvanawakening.flavor:
"Yavimaya is aware, but not always awake. You will know the difference when you see it."
-Karn

territorialallosaurus.name: Territorial Allosaurus
territorialallosaurus.rules_text:
Kicker 2G (You may pay an additional 2G as you cast this spell.)
When Territorial Allosaurus enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it fights another target creature.
territorialallosaurus.flavor: A living remnant of the Ice Age.

verdantforce.name: Verdant Force
verdantforce.rules_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
verdantforce.flavor: The bower shuddered. The stillness broke. The scurf shifted, and a being emerged from the flowers and ferns.

elfhamedruid.name: Elfhame Druid
elfhamedruid.rules_text:
T: Add G.

T: Add GG. Spend this mana only to cast kicked spells.
elfhamedruid.flavor: The bond between Llanowar elves and their kavu empowers both.

fungalplots.name: Fungus Field
fungalplots.rules_text:
1G, Exile a creature card from your graveyard : Create a 1/1 green saproling token.


Sacrifice two saprolings: Draw a card and gain 2 life.
fungalplots.flavor: Thallids nurture saprolings, entertain them, and eat them.

gaeasblessing.name: Gaea's Blessing
gaeasblessing.rules_text:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.

Draw a card.

When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

naturesspiral.name: Nature's Spiral
naturesspiral.rules_text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
naturesspiral.flavor: "As Argoth's last defenders fell to Urza's juggernauts, Titania said, "Nature cannot be destroyed, only changed."-The Antiquities War

wildonslaught.name: Wild Onslaught
wildonslaught.rules_text:
Kicker 4 (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.)
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. If this spell was kicked, put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control instead.

sporecrownthallid.name: Sporecrown Thallid
sporecrownthallid.rules_text: Each other creature you control that's a Fungus or Saproling gets +1/+1.
sporecrownthallid.flavor:
"The identifying ornamental growths of alpha thallids may be hereditary, or catalyzed by some chemical signal."
-Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

sporeswarm.name: Spore Swarm
sporeswarm.rules_text: Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
sporeswarm.flavor: As the irrespressible power of a dormant Multani courses through Yavimaya, the forest passes judgment on travelers and natives alike. Only the fungus prospers.

thornelemental.name: Thorn Elemental
thornelemental.rules_text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
thornelemental.flavor: The first law of Yavimaya is that guests may kill only to survive. As fires aren't needed in the warm weather, cutting trees for wood means death.

untamedkavu.name: Untamed Kavu
untamedkavu.rules_text:
Kicker 3 (You may pay an additional 3 as you cast this spell.)
Vigilance, trampleIf Untamed Kavu was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

adventurousimpulse.name: Adventurous Impulse
adventurousimpulse.rules_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
adventurousimpulse.flavor: Every odyssey begins with a single step.

ancientanimus.name: Ancient animus
ancientanimus.rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if it's legendary. Then it fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
ancientanimus.flavor: Multani's mind grasped for consciousness as rage itself rebuilt his body.

arborarmament.name: Arbor Armament
arborarmament.rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains reach until end of turn.
arborarmament.flavor: "Llanowar's boughs are ever readyTo unleash an autumn of steel leaves."-"Song of Freyalise"

balothgorger.name: Baloth Gorger
balothgorger.rules_text:
Kicker 4 (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.)

If Baloth Gorger was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
balothgorger.flavor: A baloth only cares about the many things it eats and the few things that eat it.

brokenbond.name: Broken Bond
brokenbond.rules_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
brokenbond.flavor: "I can't bear to see another plane broken before I make my own home whole. I'm sorry, but my watch is over."

corrosiveooze.name: Corrosive Ooze
corrosiveooze.rules_text: Whenever Corrosive Ooze blocks or becomes blocked by an equipped creature, destroy all Equipment attached to that creature at end of combat.
corrosiveooze.flavor: Nothing tastes finer to an ooze than a priceless family heirloom.

gaeasprotector.name: Gaea's Protector
gaeasprotector.rules_text: Gaea's Protector must be blocked if able.
gaeasprotector.flavor: Fallen Phyrexians were transmutated into elementals by Gaea long ago, but Yavimaya's other inhabitants still regard them with unease.

giftofgrowth.name: Gift of Growth
giftofgrowth.rules_text:
Kicker 2 (You may pay an additional 2 as you cast this spell.)
Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If this pell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

growfromtheashes.name: Grow from the Ashes
growfromtheashes.rules_text:
Kicker 2 (You may pay an additional 2 as you cast this spell.)

Seach your library for a basic land card, put it into the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If this spell was kicked, instead search your library for two basic land cards, put them onto the the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

krosandruid.name: Krosan Druid
krosandruid.rules_text:
Kicker 4G (You may pay an additional 4G as you cast this spell.)
When Krosan Druid enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you gain 10 life.
krosandruid.flavor: "Druids endure disaster as seeds endure winter. Now Krosa blooms once more."

llanowarelves.name: Llanowar Elves
llanowarelves.flavor: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.

llanowarenvoy.name: Llanowar Envoy
llanowarenvoy.rules_text: 1G: Add one mana of any color.
llanowarenvoy.flavor:
"Cherish this world in honor of the martyrs who saved it. We too must be prepared to give our lives."
-The Mending of Dominaria

llanowarscout.name: Llanowar Scout
llanowarscout.rules_text: T: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
llanowarscout.flavor: Llanowar elfhames occupy different heights within the great forest. Elves of the Lordalh and Kelfae hames can see neither earth nor sky.

mammothspider.name: Mammoth Spider
mammothspider.flavor: Most spiders of Llanowar disdain elvish alliances. No elf has as many beautiful eyes or as many strong arms.

piercethesky.name: Pierce the Sky
piercethesky.rules_text: Pierce the Sky deals 7 damage to target creature with flying.
piercethesky.flavor: Llanowar elves conceal their ballistae in the upper canopy of the forest, ready to clear the skies of any intruder.

primordialwurm.name: Primordial Wurm
primordialwurm.flavor: "You can hear its tail thrashing from a mile away. Keep in mind that its jawas may already be half a mile closer."-Jenson Carthalion, Yavimaya exile

saprolingmigration.name: Saproling Migration
saprolingmigration.rules_text:
Kicker 4 (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.)

Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. If this spell was kicked, create four of those tokens instead.
saprolingmigration.flavor: Thallids herd saprolings from place to place in search of detritus to feed them.

yavimayasapherd.name: Yavimaya Sapherd
yavimayasapherd.rules_text: When Yavimaya Sapherd enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
yavimayasapherd.flavor: "When their community grows cluttered, thallids begin a traditional bobbing dance, then trek out in all directions."-Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

teferiheroofdominaria.name: Teferi, Hero of Dominaria
teferiheroofdominaria.rules_text:
[+1]: Draw a card. At the beginning of the next end step, untap two lands.

[-3]: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library third from the top.

[-8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you draw a card, exile target permanent an opponent controls."

darigaazreincarnated.name: Darigaaz Reincarnated
darigaazreincarnated.rules_text:
Flying, trample, haste

If Darigaaz Reincarnated would die, instead exile it with three egg counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if Darigaaz Reincarnated is exiled with an egg counter on it, remove an egg counter from it. Then if Darigaaz has no egg counters on it, return it to the battlefield.

jhoiraweatherlightcaptain.name: Jhoira, Weatherlight Captain
jhoiraweatherlightcaptain.rules_text: Whenever you cast a historic spell, draw a card. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
jhoiraweatherlightcaptain.flavor: As she took the wheel of the Weatherlight for the first time in a millenium, Jhoira knew she'd been right to restore the ship. Anything was possible now.

muldrothathegravetide.name: Muldrotha, the Gravetide

militiabugler.rules_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

When Militia Bugler enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with power 2 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

noviceknight.name: Novice Knight
noviceknight.rules_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

As long as Novice Knight is enchanted or equipped, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.
noviceknight.flavor: Even the greatest hero begins with nothing.

angelofthedawn.name: Angel of the Dawn
angelofthedawn.rules_text:
Fkying


When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
angelofthedawn.flavor: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

invokethedivine.name: Invoke the Divine
invokethedivine.rules_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
invokethedivine.flavor:
"Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light."
-Song of All, canto 1008

cavalrydrillmaster.name: Cavalry Drillmaster
cavalrydrillmaster.rules_text: When Cavalry Drillmaster enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals damage before creatures without first strike.)

daybreakchaplain.name: Daybreak Chaplain
daybreakchaplain.rules_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
daybreakchaplain.flavor: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."

dwarvenpriest.name: Dwarven Priest
dwarvenpriest.rules_text: When Dwarven Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
dwarvenpriest.flavor: "These storied halls are under my protection."

gallantcavalry.name: Gallant Cavalry
gallantcavalry.rules_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this to tap.)

When Gallant Cavalry enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
gallantcavalry.flavor: "Our duty does not stop at our borders."

inspiredcharge.name: Inspired Charge
inspiredcharge.rules_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
inspiredcharge.flavor:
"Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants,... and they were barely a tenth of our number!"

-General Avitora

knightofthetusk.name: Knight of the Tusk
knightofthetusk.rules_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

knightspledge.name: Knight's Pledge
knightspledge.flavor: "As long as my faith persists, so shall I."

loxodonlinebreaker.name: Loxodon Line Breaker
loxodonlinebreaker.flavor: Loxodons are firm in stature and spirit. No matter the odds, they are always first into battle.

luminousbonds.name: Luminous Bonds
luminousbonds.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
luminousbonds.flavor: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."

mightyleap.name: Mighty Leap
mightyleap.rules_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
mightyleap.flavor: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

oreskosswiftclaw.name: Oreskos Swiftclaw
oreskosswiftclaw.flavor: The leonin of Oreskos are quick to take offense-not because they are thin-skinned, but because they are always ready for a fight.

pegasuscourser.name: Pegasus Courser
pegasuscourser.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Pegasus Courser attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
pegasuscourser.flavor: A pegasus chooses its rider, bearing the worthy into the clouds and tossing all others to the ground.

revitalize.name: Revitalize
revitalize.rules_text:
You gain 3 life.

Draw a card.
revitalize.flavor:
"A portion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in."
-Torricks, battlefield medic

rustwingfalcon.name: Rustwing Falcon
rustwingfalcon.flavor: Native to wide prairies and scrublands, falcons occasionally roost in dragon skeletons.

starcrownedstag.name: Star-Crowned Stag
starcrownedstag.rules_text: Whenever Star-Crowned Stag attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
starcrownedstag.flavor: White as starlight on snow, it appears only on the eve of the winter solstice.

takevengeance.name: Take Vengeance
takevengeance.flavor: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

trustypackbeast.name: Trusty Packbeast
trustypackbeast.rules_text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
trustypackbeast.flavor:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
-Hewen Frit, merchant

djinnofwishes.name: Djinn of Wishes
djinnofwishes.rules_text:
Flying

Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.

2UU, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

mysticarcheologist.name: Mystic Archeologist
mysticarcheologist.flavor: The delight of discovery drives the pursuit of knowledge.

supremephantom.name: Supreme Phantom
supremephantom.rules_text:
Flying

 Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.
supremephantom.flavor: A king's knowledge does not vanish when the heart stops beating.

saimasterthopterist.name: Sai, Master Thopterist
saimasterthopterist.rules_text:
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

1U, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.
saimasterthopterist.flavor: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."

onewiththemachine.name: One with the Machine
onewiththemachine.rules_text: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among artifacts you control.
onewiththemachine.flavor:
"When I grafted the Planar Bridge into myself I felt my Planeswalker spark flare beyond my body. The Multiverse was my plaything. It felt... incredible."

- Tezzeret

mistcaller.name: Mistcaller
mistcaller.rules_text: Sacrifice Mistcaller: Until end of turn, if a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
mistcaller.flavor: Hospitality is of little concern to those who do not wish to be disturbed.

metamorphicalteration.name: Metamorphic Alteration
metamorphicalteration.rules_text:
Enchant creature

As Metamorphic Alteration enters the battlefield, choose a creature.

Enchanted creature is a copy of the chosen creature.

patientrebuilding.name: Patient Rebuilding
patientrebuilding.rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard, then you draw a card for each land card put into that graveyard this way.
patientrebuilding.flavor: Nicol Bolas would not rest until he was restored to his former glory.

windreadersphinx.name: Windreader Sphinx
windreadersphinx.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.
windreadersphinx.flavor: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

bonetoash.name: Bone to Ash
bonetoash.rules_text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.
bonetoash.flavor:
"I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."

-Ludevic, necro-alchemist

departeddeckhand.name: Departed Deckhand
departeddeckhand.rules_text:
When Departed Deckhand becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.

Departed Deckhand can't be blocked except by spirits.

3U: Another target creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by Spirits.

horizonscholar.name: Horizon Scholar
horizonscholar.rules_text:
Flying

When Horizon Scholar enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

mirrorimage.name: Mirror Image
mirrorimage.rules_text: You may have Mirror Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature you control.
mirrorimage.flavor: The life of a shapeshifter is one of constant change.

psychiccorrosion.name: Psychic Corrosion
psychiccorrosion.rules_text: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
psychiccorrosion.flavor:
"To break another's mind is to deliver a fate worse than death. It is a terrifying power."
-Jace Beleren

skilledanimator.name: Skilled Animator
skilledanimator.rules_text: When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

exclusionmage.name: Exclusion Mage
exclusionmage.rules_text: When Exclusion Mage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
exclusionmage.flavor: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.

sift.name: Sift
sift.rules_text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
sift.flavor: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.rules_text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
sleep.flavor:
"I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."
-Garild, merfolk mage

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.rules_text: Exchange control of two target creatures.
switcheroo.flavor: Say hello to your new friend.

aethertunnel.name: Aether Tunnel
aethertunnel.rules_text:
Enchant creature


Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.
aethertunnel.flavor: If you can't find a doorway, make one.

aviationpioneer.name: Aviation Pioneer
aviationpioneer.rules_text: When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
aviationpioneer.flavor: "They say perfection is unattainable, but they said that about flight too."

anticipate.name: Anticipate
anticipate.rules_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
anticipate.flavor: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

avenwindmage.name: Aven Wind Mage
avenwindmage.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
avenwindmage.flavor: "my skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.flavor: "I decides what stands in my way."

disperse.name: Disperse
disperse.rules_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
disperse.flavor: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.

divination.name: Divination
divination.flavor: "The stars mark your destiny. May you accept the fate thus divulged."

dwindle.name: Dwindle
dwindle.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.

When enchanted creature blocks, destroy it. (The attacking creature remains blocked.)
dwindle.flavor: The collection didn't have room to expand, to the wizard improvised a solution.

essencescatter.name: Essence Scatter
essencescatter.flavor: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

frilledseaserpent.name: Frilled Sea Serpent
frilledseaserpent.rules_text: 5UU:  Frilled Sea Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
frilledseaserpent.flavor:
"Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"
-Gertrude, deep-sea angler

gearsmithprodigy.name: Gearsmith Prodigy
gearsmithprodigy.rules_text: Gearsmith Prodigy gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.
gearsmithprodigy.flavor: Young artificers on Kaladesh let their imaginations run wild.

ghostform.name: Ghostform
ghostform.rules_text: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.

omenspeaker.name: Omenspeaker
omenspeaker.rules_text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
omenspeaker.flavor: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

salvagerofsecrets.name: Salvager of Secrets
salvagerofsecrets.rules_text: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
salvagerofsecrets.flavor: The greatest treasure of the deep is an echo from above.

scholarofstars.name: Scholar of Stars
scholarofstars.rules_text: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.
scholarofstars.flavor: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."

snappingdrake.name: Snapping Drake
snappingdrake.flavor: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.

tolarianscholar.name: Tolarian Scholar
tolarianscholar.flavor: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kings of experiemnts that ruined the original island of Tolaria.

totallylost.name: Totally Lost
totallylost.rules_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

uncomfortablechill.name: Uncomfortable Chill
uncomfortablechill.rules_text:
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.

Draw a card.
uncomfortablechill.flavor: The cold slowed their movements until only their movements until only their panicked eyeballs swiveled beneath the ice.

wallofmist.name: Wall of Mist
wallofmist.flavor: The seafloor is flecked with the bones of fools who dared to sail into the mist.

frayingomnipotence.name: Fraying Omnipotence
frayingomnipotence.rules_text: Each player loses half their life, then discards half the cards in their hand, then sacrifices half the creatures they control. Round up each time.
frayingomnipotence.flavor: The Great Mending that healed the Multiverse also unraveled the threads of Nicol Bolas's power.

graveyardmarshal.name: Graveyard Marshal
graveyardmarshal.rules_text: 2B, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
graveyardmarshal.flavor:
"Rise and shine, my dears. We have work to do."

- Isareth the Awakener

lilianascontract.name: Liliana's Contract
lilianascontract.rules_text:
When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.

phylacterylich.name: Phylactery Lich
phylacterylich.rules_text:
Indestructible


As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control.

When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

openthegraves.name: Open the Graves
openthegraves.rules_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
openthegraves.flavor: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.

deathbaron.name: Death Baron
deathbaron.rules_text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
deathbaron.flavor: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

demonofcatastrophes.name: Demon of Catastrophes
demonofcatastrophes.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Flying, trample.
demonofcatastrophes.flavor: A pit yawned open, a column of oily smoke arose, and a towering form hissed, "I accept this offering."

infernalreckoning.name: Infernal Reckoning
infernalreckoning.rules_text: Exile target colorless creature. You gain life equal to its power.
infernalreckoning.flavor: "When these intruders are gone, Zendikar will be my throne, my palace, my playground."

isareththeawakener.name: Isareth the Awakener
isareththeawakener.rules_text:
Deathtouch

Whenever Isareth the Awakener attacks, you may pay X. When you do, return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield with a corpse counter on it. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

stitcherssupplier.name: Stitcher's Supplier
stitcherssupplier.rules_text: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

fellspecter.name: Fell Specter
fellspecter.rules_text:
Flying



When Fell Specter enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.

reassemblingskeleton.name: Reassembling Skeleton
reassemblingskeleton.rules_text: 1B: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
reassemblingskeleton.flavor:
"They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."

-Zul Ashur, lich lord

blooddivination.name: Blood Divination
blooddivination.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Draw three cards.
blooddivination.flavor: Predicting the future is a messy business.

diregrafghoul.name: Diregraf Ghoul
diregrafghoul.rules_text: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.
diregrafghoul.flavor:
"At least one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs."
-Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

risefromthegrave.name: Rise from the Grave
risefromthegrave.rules_text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
risefromthegrave.flavor: "Death is no excuse for disobedience."-Liliana Vess

gravedigger.name: Gravedigger
gravedigger.rules_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
gravedigger.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer - both are attractive to thieves.

murder.name: Murder
murder.flavor: "It's not work if you enjoy it."

nightmaresthirst.name: Nightmare's Thirst
nightmaresthirst.rules_text: You gain 1 life. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
nightmaresthirst.flavor: That feeling of something on your chest is usually sleep paralysis. Occasionally, it's something else.

ravenousharpy.name: Ravenous Harpy
ravenousharpy.rules_text:
Flying

1, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Harpy.
ravenousharpy.flavor: A harpy's hoard is a filthy, bloodstained pile of trinkets and corpses.

vampiresovereign.name: Vampire Sovereign
vampiresovereign.rules_text:
Flying

When Vampire Sovereign enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
vampiresovereign.flavor:
"Your service shall be rewarded."

- Queen Lian

abnormalendurance.name: Abnormal Endurance
abnormalendurance.rules_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

bogstomper.name: Bogstomper
bogstomper.flavor:
"They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm."
-Vivien Reid

childofnight.name: Child of Night
childofnight.rules_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
childofnight.flavor: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

doomeddissenter.name: Doomed Dissenter
doomeddissenter.rules_text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
doomeddissenter.flavor: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

duress.name: Duress
duress.rules_text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
duress.flavor: Solitude and starvation are brutal punishment, but even worse is all that time to think.

epicureofblood.name: Epicure of Blood
epicureofblood.rules_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
epicureofblood.flavor: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

hiredblade.name: Hired Blade
hiredblade.rules_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
hiredblade.flavor: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."

infectioushorror.name: Infectious Horror
infectioushorror.rules_text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
infectioushorror.flavor: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

infernalscarring.name: Infernal Scarring
infernalscarring.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
infernalscarring.flavor: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

lichscaress.name: Lich's Caress
lichscaress.rules_text: Destroy target target creature. You gain 3 life.
lichscaress.flavor: A lich must consume mortal souls to feed its eternal life.

macabrewaltz.name: Macabre Waltz
macabrewaltz.rules_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
macabrewaltz.flavor: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

mindrot.name: Mind Rot
mindrot.flavor: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

skeletonarcher.name: Skeleton Archer
skeletonarcher.rules_text: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
skeletonarcher.flavor:
"When it comes to killing with precision, a soul is but a hindrance."
-Isareth the Awakener

skymarchbloodletter.name: Skymarch Bloodletter
skymarchbloodletter.rules_text:
Flying

When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
skymarchbloodletter.flavor: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.

sovereignsbite.name: Sovereign's Bite
sovereignsbite.rules_text: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
sovereignsbite.flavor:
"You have given all to your kingdom, dear knight. Serenity shall be your prize."

- Queen Lian

stranglingspores.name: Strangling Spores
stranglingspores.rules_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
stranglingspores.flavor: Imagine a thousand tiny mushrooms cropping up within your lungs.

twoheadedzombie.name: Two-Headed Zombie
twoheadedzombie.rules_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
twoheadedzombie.flavor:
"Thread the torsos together with angel hair to ensure they will cooperate in battle."

-The Stitcher's Tome

walkingcorpse.name: Walking Corpse
walkingcorpse.flavor:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they are feared."
-Judar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

vampireneonate.name: Vampire Neonate
vampireneonate.rules_text: 2, T: Each opponent loses 1 life and gain 1ife.
vampireneonate.flavor: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.

dismissivepyromancer.name: Dismissive Pyromancer
dismissivepyromancer.rules_text:
R, T, Discard a card: Draw a card



2R, T, Sacrifice Dismissive Pyromancer: It deals 4 damage to target creature.

demandingdragon.name: Demanding Dragon
demandingdragon.rules_text:
Flying


When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.
demandingdragon.flavor: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.

spitflame.name: Spit Flame
spitflame.rules_text:
Spit Flame deals 4 damage to target creature.


Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay R. If you do, return Spit Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

goblintrashmaster.name: Goblin Trashmaster
goblintrashmaster.rules_text:
Other Goblins you control get +1/+1.


Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target artifact.
goblintrashmaster.flavor: "Folks 'round here are too in love with their contraptions. Does them some good if we smash one every so often."

banefire.name: Banefire
banefire.rules_text:
Banefire deals X damage to any target.

If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.
banefire.flavor: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage spelndor.

sarkhansunsealing.name: Sarkhan's Unsealing
sarkhansunsealing.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 4, 5, or 6, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to any target.

Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 7 or greater, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to each opponent and each creature or planeswalker they control.

alpinemoon.name: Alpine Moon
alpinemoon.rules_text: As Alpine Moon enters the battlefield, choose a nonbasic land card name. Lands your opponents control with the chosen name lose all land types and abilities, and they gain "T: Add one mana of any color."

darkdwelleroracle.name: Dark-Dweller Oracle
darkdwelleroracle.rules_text: 1, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)
darkdwelleroracle.flavor: eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.

lathlissdragonqueen.name: Lathliss, Dragon Queen
lathlissdragonqueen.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever another nontoken Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

1R: Dragons you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

thud.name: Thud
thud.rules_text:
As an additional cost to this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Thud deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

guttersnipe.name: Guttersnipe
guttersnipe.rules_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.
guttersnipe.flavor: "I found a new toy. Wanna play?"

doublecast.name: Doublecast
doublecast.rules_text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
doublecast.flavor: First the insult, then the encore.

dragonegg.name: Dragon Egg
dragonegg.rules_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

When Dragon Egg dies, put a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. It has "R: This creature gets +1/0 until end of turn."
dragonegg.flavor: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

infernohellion.name: Inferno Hellion
infernohellion.rules_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

At the beginning of each end step, if Inferno Hellion attacked or blocked this turn, its owner shuffles it inot their library.

lightningstrike.name: Lightning Strike
lightningstrike.rules_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
lightningstrike.flavor: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

siegebreakergiant.name: Siegebreaker Giant
siegebreakergiant.rules_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

3R: Target creature can't block this turn.
siegebreakergiant.flavor: No rampart can withstand the fury of a giant.

tectonicrift.name: Tectonic Rift
tectonicrift.rules_text: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
tectonicrift.flavor:
"You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!"
-Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord

volcanicdragon.name: Volcanic Dragon
volcanicdragon.rules_text:
Flying

Haste (This creature can attack and T as soon as it comes under your control.)
volcanicdragon.flavor: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

volleyveteran.name: Volley Veteran
volleyveteran.rules_text: When Volley Veteran enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.

havocdevils.name: Havoc Devils
havocdevils.rules_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
havocdevils.flavor: For devils, burning things is the highest form of comedy, diversion, and artistic expression.

viashinopyromancer.name: Viashino Pyromancer

viashinopyromancer.flavor: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."

actoftreason.name: Act of Treason

"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."

- Sarkhan Vol

boggartbrute.name: Boggart Brute
boggartbrute.rules_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
boggartbrute.flavor: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

catalystelemental.name: Catalyst Elemental
catalystelemental.flavor: As the hyperstormic generator crept past redline, a being emerged from the arc.

crashthrough.name: Crash Through
crashthrough.rules_text: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.Draw a card.
crashthrough.flavor: "We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can."-Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.rules_text: Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.
electrify.flavor: "Some hid from the storm. I embraced it and learned its name."

fieryfinish.name: Fiery Finish
fieryfinish.rules_text: Fiery Finish deals 7 damage to target creature.

fireelemental.name: Fire Elemental
fireelemental.flavor: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.

goblininstigator.name: Goblin Instigator
goblininstigator.rules_text: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

goblinmotivator.name: Goblin Motivator
goblinmotivator.rules_text: T: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and T this turn.)

hostileminotaur.name: Hostile Minotaur
hostileminotaur.rules_text: Haste (This creature can attack and T as soon as it comes under your control.)
hostileminotaur.flavor: The bellow of a miniotaur always translates to "charge."

lavaaxe.name: Lava Axe
lavaaxe.rules_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

onakkeogre.name: Onakke Ogre
onakkeogre.flavor: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.

shock.name: Shock
shock.rules_text: Deal 2 damage to target creature or player.

smelt.name: Smelt

Flying

sparktonguedragon.flavor: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

surestrike.name: Sure Strike

tormentingvoice.name: Tormenting Voice

As an additional cost to cast Tormenting Voice, discard a card.

tormentingvoice.flavor: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"-Sarkhan Vol

trumpetblast.name: Trumpet Blast

thornlieutenant.name: Thorn Lieutenant

Whenever Thorn Lieutenant becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

5G: Thorn Lieutenant gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

Whenever Hungering Hydra is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to receive the counters.)

4GG, T: Search your library for a card named Elvish Clancaller, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
elvishclancaller.flavor: No single root feeds the forest.

gigantosaurus.name: Gigantosaurus

"Each tooth is the length of a horse, and new ones grow in every sixteen days. Let's get a closer look!"
-Vivien Reid

pelakkawurm.name: Pelakka Wurm
pelakkawurm.rules_text:
Trample
When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life.
When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

prodigiousgrowth.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. When a creature is put onto the battlefield this way, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

blanchwoodarmor.name: Blanchwood Armor

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

druidofhorns.flavor: No welcome for those who trespass. Only fang and horn and claw.

dryadgreenseeker.flavor: "The land already knows its destiny. I simply ask it to share the tale with me."

ghirapurguide.flavor: The city of Ghirapur is a living thing, and living things defend themselves.

giftofparadise.name: Gift of Paradise

Enchant - Land

Enchanted land has "T: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."

recollect.name: Recollect
recollect.rules_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
recollect.flavor: "The bones of the past will tell their tales-if you know how to speak their language."

reclamationsage.name: Reclamation Sage
reclamationsage.rules_text: When Reclaiming Mage enters the battlefield you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
reclamationsage.flavor: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

colossalmajesty.name: Colossal Majesty

"Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them."
-Inti, Sun Empire knight

"If you think yourself a chief, then prove your might."

vigilantbaloth.name: Vigilant Baloth

vigilantbaloth.flavor: Villagers employ watchdogs as guardians and companions. Druids prefer something a little bigger.

rootsnare.name: Root Snare

druidofthecowl.name: Druid of the Cowl

druidofthecowl.flavor: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."

bristlingboar.name: Bristling Boar

"Nicol Bolas destroyed my world. I owe it to Skalla to celebrate all life, no matter how dangerous."
-Vivien Reid

centaurcourser.name: Centaur Courser

"The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."
-Ramal, sage of Wategate

colossaldreadmaw.name: Colossal Dreadmaw

daggerbackbasilisk.name: Daggerback Basilisk

"Petryifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva... Am I missing anything?... Toxic bones? Seriously?
-Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

elvishrejuvenator.name: Elvish Rejuvenator

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

giantspider.name: Plummet
giantspider.flavor:
"After everything I've survived, it's hard to be frightened by anything anymore."
-Vivien Reid

greenwoodsentinel.name: Greenwood Sentinel
greenwoodsentinel.rules_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

highlandgame.name: Highland Game

naturalize.name: Naturalize

"And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines."
-Iveta, rooftop runner

oakenform.name: Oakenform
oakenform.flavor:
"When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"
-Dionus, elvish archdruid

plummet.name: Plummet
plummet.flavor:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
-Dejara, Giltwood druid

rabidbite.name: Rabid Bite

T: Add one mana of any color.

Flying

T: Add one mana of any color.

4, T: Put a charge counter on Magistrate's Scepter.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance attacking.




Equip 3

arcaneencyclopedia.name: Arcane Encyclopedia

suspiciousbookcase.name: Suspicious Bookcase
suspiciousbookcase.rules_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)


3, T: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
suspiciousbookcase.flavor: All the books were dusty with disuse, save the one titled Camouflage and Its Practical Applications.

gargoylesentinel.name: Gargoyle Sentinel
gargoylesentinel.rules_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

3: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.
gargoylesentinel.flavor:
"Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to."

- Bonovar, siege commander

millstone.rules_text: 2, T: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

fountainofrenewal.name: Fountain of Renewal
fountainofrenewal.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.

3, Sacrifice Fountain of Renewal: Draw a card.

roguesgloves.name: Rogue's Gloves

explosiveapparatus.name: Explosive Apparatus

explosiveapparatus.flavor: "Souls are volatile things. When compressed and loaded into a handheld device, their destructive potential is quite impressive."-Dierk, geistmage

gearsmithguardian.name: Gearsmith Guardian
gearsmithguardian.rules_text: Gearsmith Guardian gets +2/+0 as long as you control a blue creature.
gearsmithguardian.flavor: Made in its creator's image, though slightly more clangy.

fieldcreeper.name: Field Creeper

manalith.name: Manalith
manalith.rules_text: T: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
manalith.flavor: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unwittingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.

maraudersaxe.name: Marauder's Axe
maraudersaxe.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0

Equip 2 ( 2: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
maraudersaxe.flavor: A sharp axe solves most problems.

skyscanner.name: Skyscanner
skyscanner.rules_text:
Flying

When Skyscanner enters the battlefield, draw a card.

detectiontower.rules_text:
T: Add ◊ to your mana pool.

1, T: Until end of turn, your opponents and creatures they control with hexproof can be the target of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.

reliquarytower.name: Reliquary Tower
reliquarytower.rules_text:
You have no maximum hand size.

T: Add ◊.
reliquarytower.flavor: The most holy treasures are kept far from unclean soil.

rupturespire.name: Rupture Spire
rupturespire.rules_text:

When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay 1.

T: Add one mana of any color.

cinderbarrens.name: Cinder Barrens
cinderbarrens.rules_text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.

T: Add B or R.
cinderbarrens.flavor:
"I do as I choose what is mine. And it is all mine."

- Nicol Bolas

forsakensanctuary.name: Forsaken Sanctuary
forsakensanctuary.rules_text:
Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.

T: Add W or B.
forsakensanctuary.flavor:
"Prayers will curdle on the tongue and be heard by rotting ears."
-Minaldra, the Vinag Atum

foulorchard.name: Foul Orchard
foulorchard.rules_text:
Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.

T: Add B or G.

highlandlake.name: Highland Lake
highlandlake.rules_text:

"A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure...Nah."
-Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab

meanderingriver.rules_text:

stonequarry.name: Stone Quarry
stonequarry.rules_text:
Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.

T: Add R or W.
stonequarry.flavor: The bedrock has many gifts to give.

submergedboneyard.name: Submerged Boneyard
submergedboneyard.rules_text:
Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped.

T: Add U or B.
submergedboneyard.flavor:
"Long after the land has given up the last of its secrets, there will still be mysteries in the depths of the sea."

- Kiora
